title: Instructional Design and Alpha/Beta Testing Process for Simulation-Based Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational medical simulation design methodologies
context.additional_context: Strengthening simulation scenario development competencies in smartphone-centric, limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can realistically design medical simulation scenarios.
Learners can systematically improve scenario protocols through alpha/beta testing.
Learners can effectively structure role distribution and implementation phases of simulation-based education.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
